DescriptionData.Title: AJs Swirl Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Talk a walk on the wild side with our daring swirl striped socks! The white and red stripes swirl from the top down to the ankle, and the socks have a white cushioned foot. Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13), approximately 25 inches long. Shoe sizes 5 and up.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Swirl socks with white and red stripes from the top to the ankle
Approximately 25" long
Fits most adult sizes (sock size 11-13, shoe size 5 and up)
White cushioned foot
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Star Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Blast off with our star socks! These fun socks feature blue and red stars on a solid white background. At approximately 25 inches long, they fit most adult sizes and have a cushioned foot. Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13). Shoe sizes 5 and up.

Approximately 25" long

Cushioned foot

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Heart Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: These adorable knee high socks are patterned with hearts from the top down to the ankle and have a solid color, cushioned foot. A variety of colors are available in women's sizes, approximately 25 inches long. Our ladies sized socks are made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13,shoe sizes 5 and up).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Women's knee-high socks
Patterned with hearts from the top down to the ankle and a solid cushioned foot
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
Approximately 25" long
Sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11-13, shoe sizes 5 and up)

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Nylon Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Nylon knee high socks are perfect for warmer climates and summer events. These black athletic socks are great for softball and other summer sports. Each sock has a finished welt at the top to help it stay where it's supposed to. An assortment of rich hues is available in adult sizes (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up) at about 27 inches long. Made from 100% nylon, these are also called baseball sanitary socks, and are appropriate for sports of all types.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Knee High Nylon Socks - Black
Finished welt at the top helps the sock stay up
Available in adult sizes (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up)
About 27" long
Also called baseball sanitary socks

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Smiley Face Knee High Socks
DescriptionData.Description: These fun knee high socks will brighten everyone's day! Each lemon yellow tube sock has a cheerful smiley face woven in on the front - these are great for anyone performing at children's parties or events. Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up) at about 27 inches long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 27 inches long
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
Fits most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up)
Yellow
Socks come in pairs

DescriptionData.Title: AJs Polka Dot Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Funky knee high socks with polka dots that extend from the top down to the ankle and a solid color, cushioned foot. We have a range of vivid colors. Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, shoe sizes 5 and up), approximately 25 inches long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 29 inches long
Fit most adults, black sock with neon orange dots
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
Less stretchy than striped knee socks and retro tube socks. Will stretch to 12 inches in circumference
Socks are sold in pairs
